relation: Darrow3 - #88 Jeff discovers Shrooom!'s drawing, which seems to bring about a sudden mood swing. Can he handle this mushroom menace alone?
Darrow3 - #89 Trying his best techniques, Shrooom! is unable to overcome his natural clumsiness. If only the projectiles he can absorb wouldn't explode, maybe he'd actually be at an advantage.
Darrow3 - #90 After an explosive game of butterfingers, Shrooom!'s secret is revealed. Don't worry, pal, there's always Rogaine.
Darrow3 - #91 Shrooom! begins his tale of how his journey began....but is promptly pushed into the more interesting bit. Namely, his history with an old friend.
Darrow3 - #92 A tragic tale of hair loss in the form of mushroom caps and leaves becomes a story of friendship and bonding.
